title: Refund Policy
content: Our refund policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Full refund will be issued to original payment method within 5-7 business days. Shipping costs are non-refundable unless item was defective or wrong item shipped. Defective items: Full refund including shipping. Wrong item shipped: Full refund including shipping.

title: Exchange Policy
content: Exchanges accepted within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn and in original condition. Free exchange shipping for defective items or wrong items shipped. Customer pays return shipping ($5.99) for size/color exchanges. Processing time: 3-5 business days after receiving returned item.

title: Shipping Policy
content: Standard shipping: 5-7 business days ($5.99). Express shipping: 2-3 business days ($12.99). Free shipping on orders over $50. Tracking number provided via email once shipped. International shipping available to select countries (10-15 business days, $19.99).

title: Warranty Policy
content: All products come with manufacturer's warranty. iPhone products: 1-year limited warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship. Does not cover accidental damage or normal wear and tear. Extended warranty available for purchase. Warranty claims must be filed within warranty period.

title: How to Track Your Order
content: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can track your package at: 1) Click the tracking link in your shipping confirmation email, 2) Visit our website and enter your order number, 3) Use the carrier's website directly (UPS, FedEx, USPS). Tracking updates may take 24 hours to appear after shipping.

title: Canceling an Order
content: Orders can be canceled within 2 hours of placement. After 2 hours, the order enters processing and cannot be canceled. If already shipped, you can refuse delivery for a full refund, or wait to receive it and return using our standard return policy (30 days). Contact customer support immediately if you need to cancel.

title: Accepted Payment Methods
content: We accept: Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), Debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Buy Now Pay Later options (Affirm, Klarna). All payments are processed securely. Refunds are issued to the original payment method.
